title: Italian meatball lasagne
ingredients: ['For the meatballs', '200g stale white bread, soaked in water for 10 minutes', '500g mixed minced meat (such as veal and pork)', '2 eggs', '100g grated Parmesan cheese', '50g grated Pecorino cheese', '120ml white wine', '1 good handful chopped parsley', '1 teaspoon nutmeg', 'salt, to taste', '750ml sunflower oil to deep frying', 'For the tomato sauce', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 celery stalk, finely chopped', '1.5L of passata (or sieved tomatoes)', 'For the bechamel sauce', '70g butter', '70g plain flour', '1L milk', 'salt, pepper and nutmeg to taste', 'To assemble', '500g fresh lasagne sheets', '150g grated Parmesan cheese']
